basicInfo.caseDescription: the victim was assaulted by online social media platform

questions.question: What specific type of cyber assault occurred?
questions.placeholder: Describe the nature of the assault (e.g., grooming, harassment, threats, etc.)

questions.question: What social media platform was used?
questions.placeholder: Name of the platform (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, etc.)

questions.question: What evidence is available (screenshots, logs, messages, etc.)?
questions.placeholder: Describe the evidence and its location

questions.question: Were there any witnesses to the online interaction?
questions.placeholder: Provide details about any witnesses, if any.

questions.question: What is the victim's full name?
What is the victim's contact information?
What is the assailant's known information (username, profile details, etc.)?
questions.placeholder: Any details that could identify the assailant

questions.question: Has the victim experienced any psychological trauma or other harm as a result of the assault?
questions.placeholder: Describe any physical or emotional effects on the victim

basicInfo.caseDescription: the victim was assaulted by online social media platform

questions.question: What specific type of cyber assault occurred?
questions.placeholder: Describe the nature of the assault (e.g., harassment, threats, grooming, exposure to inappropriate content, etc.)

questions.question: Which social media platform was involved?
questions.placeholder: Name of the platform (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, TikTok)

questions.question: What evidence is available (screenshots, messages, etc.)?
questions.placeholder: Describe the evidence and its location (e.g., saved on phone, cloud storage, etc.)

questions.question: Has the victim received any psychological support or counselling?
What is the victim's contact information (parent/guardian)?
Has a police report been filed?
